name: VAGUE
description:
VAGUE is a virtual art gallery that you can explore online. With 30% of art galleries and museums closed due to COVID-19, we decided to create a virtual art gallery so that people could enjoy the arts.

Current Exhibits Include work by Jean-Michel Basquiat, Claude Monet, Hannah Hoch, Helen Frankenthaler, MC Escher, and more! See the floor plan below for  more information:

Controls:
Mouse and Keyboard
WASD to move
MOUSE to look
LEFT CLICK to interact
ESC to open the escape menu
C to change the camera view

Each work in the museum comes with a description that is activated by looking at the piece. The VAGUE museum is a great place to study art history and learn about various art movements and the artists that pioneered them. These influential men and women helped shaped what art is today.
